en: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me; For my soul taketh refuge in thee: Yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I take refuge, Until these calamities be overpast.
hmr: Aw Pathien, mi lunginsiet rawh: Ka hringna hi nangmaa chun a hung tlulût sih a: Anih, i thla hnuoia chun himna zawng ka tih, Vângduoinahai hi ân kieng hmakhat chun.

en: I will cry unto God Most High, Unto God that performeth all things for me.
hmr: Pathien Achunghnungtak chu ko ka ta, Pathien iengkim mi thawpêktu chu.

en: He will send from heaven, and save me, When he that would swallow me up reproacheth; [Selah God will send forth his lovingkindness and his truth.
hmr: Mi lem zo tumtu chun a mi hrilsiet pha chun, Ama chun vâna inthawkin hung tir a ta, mi sanhim a tih: Pathienin a ngilneina le a thutak hung tir suok a tih.

en: My soul is among lions; I lie among them that are set on fire, Even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, And their tongue a sharp sword.
hmr: Ka hringna hi sakeibaknei laiah a um a, Mihriem nauhai fa zo hmang- tuhai laia chun ka zâl a. Chuonghai hahai chu fei le thalhai an nih; An lei chu kâwlhnâm ngeitak a nih.

en: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; Let thy glory be above all the earth.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chu vân khûm rak khin chawimawiin um la, I ropuina chu leihnuoi po po chunga hin hung um raw se.

en: They have prepared a net for my steps; My soul is bowed down: They have digged a pit before me; They are fallen into the midst thereof themselves. [Selah
hmr: Ka ke âwkna dingin lên an phah a, Ka hringna hi a tlep ngawi ngawi a, Ka hmaah khur an cho a, Anni ngei a lai takah an tla tah a.

en: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing, yea, I will sing praises.
hmr: Ka lungril hi a det a nih, aw Pathien, ka lungril hi a det a nih: Hla sak ka tih, anih, inpâkna hla sak ka tih.

en: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake right early.
hmr: Ka ropuina, har rawh, per- khuong le ṭingṭanghai, har ro: Kei chu zîngkâr har ka tih.

en: I will give thanks unto thee, O Lord, among the peoples: I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi tin laiahai chun lâwmthu hril ka ti che, Hnam tin laia chun nangma inpâkin hla sak ka tih.

en: For thy lovingkindness is great unto the heavens, And thy truth unto the skies.
hmr: I ngilneina chu vân tawng khawpin a nasa sih a. I thutakna chu vân dum tawng khawpin a nasa bawk a.

en: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; Let thy glory be above all the earth.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chu vân khûm dai khin chawimawiin um rawh, I ropuina chu leihnuoi po po chunga hin hung um raw se.
